html:
{%- if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif -%}
{% if not no_letterhead and footer %}
{{ footer }}
{% endif %}

VEHICLE REQUEST

{{ doc.name }}
Date: {{ doc.posting_date }}   
Desuup {{ doc.employee_name }}, bearing Desuung Id {{ doc.employee }}, {{ doc.designation }}, {{ doc.branch }}, would like to request for the following:

 
EQUIPMENT DETAILS
{%- for row in doc.equipment_details_table -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl.No Equipment Type No. of Vehicle Purpose Details
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.equipment_type }} {{ row.no_of_vehicle }} {{ row.purpose_details }}

TRAVEL SCHEDULE
{%- for row in doc.travel_shedule_table -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl.No Date From Place To Place No. Of Passenger
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.date }} {{ row.from_place }} {{ row.to_place }} {{ row.no_of_passenger }}

{% if doc.approval_detail_table %}
APPROVAL DETAIL
{% endif %}
{% if doc.approval_detail_table%} {%- for row in doc.approval_detail_table -%} {%- endfor -%}
Sl.No Equipment Equipment Model Registration Number Operator
{{ row.idx }} {{ row.equipment }} {{ row.equipment_model }} {{ row.registration_number }} {{ row.operator }}

{% endif %}
MTO Remarks:

{{doc.mto_remarks}}

{%- if doc.dg_remarks-%}
DG Remarks:

{{doc.dg_remarks}}

{%- endif -%}



*****************************************************************************************************************************
VEHICLE REPORTING TIME AND LOCATION
Date and Time: {{doc.vehicle_reporting}}
Location:{{doc.location}}
******************************************************************************************************************************



{%- if doc.approver == doc.verifier or not doc.verifier -%}
Verified & Approved By:   {{doc.approver}} {%- if doc.approver_designation -%} ({{doc.approver_designation}}) {%- else -%} {%- endif -%}
{%- else -%}
Verified By:   {%- if doc.verifier -%} ({{doc.verifier}})

Motor & Transport Officer

{%- endif -%}
Approved By:   {%- if doc.approver-%} ({{doc.approver}})

DIRECTOR GENERAL

{%- endif -%}
{%- endif -%}
name: Vehicle Request Print
